Solution.statement: Solution: SC-40 MSn1: Log of wireless connection request
Solution: SC-40 MSn2: Log of wireless connected devices

MainGoal.control_action: protects external and internal wireless links from the signal parameter attacks
MainGoal.statement: Goal: SC-40 SC-40 Main: information system protects external and internal wireless links from the signal parameter attacks; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(wirelessLinksTypes), val(attackTypes),val(wirelessLinksCapability)]; aw = 1

MainGoal.control_action: establish configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of wireless acces
MainGoal.statement: Goal: AC-18 AC-18 Main: organization establish configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for each type of wireless acces; Impact = high, Provides= [ val(usageRestrictions ),sat(usageRestrictions),val(connectionRequirement),sat(connectionRequirement),val(implementationGuidance), sat(implementationGuidance)]; aw = 1

ReqGoal.functional_requirement: authorize connection request before connecting devices
ReqGoal.statement: Goal: SC-40 Req1: authorizeConnectionRequest maintains authorize connection request before connecting devices; aw = 1

ModuleGoal.statement: Module: SAC SC-40 M1 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of authorizeConnectionRequest; aw = 1
Module: SAC SC-40 M2 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of connectToDevice; aw = 1

OppGoal.statement: Goal: SAC SC-40 M1- G1: Variables = Conn; Condition = get Conn for device authorization; aw = 1

OppGoal.condition: check request with authorized device list
OppGoal.statement: Goal: SAC SC-40 M1- G2: Variables = Conn; Condition = check request with authorized device list; aw = 1
Goal: SAC SC-40 M1- G3: Variables = AuthConn; Condition = set true for authorized device; aw = 1
Goal: SAC SC-40 M2- G1: Variables = Conn; Condition = set true for authorized device; aw = 1
Goal: SAC SC-40 M2- G2: Variables = send; Condition = send data to connected device; aw = 1

Strategy.statement: Strategy: M1 S1: Argument over authorizeConnectionRequest
Strategy: M2 S1: Argument over connectToDevice
